name: EnglishTenses
0:
”Alexa, open English Tenses”
”Play Guess the tense”
”Change the level”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: english tenses
Developer Terms of Use
des:
English Tenses is an educational voice skill that puts an entertaining spin to learning verb tenses. With an engaging quiz format comprising two kinds of challenges, it allows players to take a crack at identifying and changing the tenses of unlimited English verbs. The game level, Change the tense, as the name suggests involves changing the verb from 1 tense to another. On the other hand, Guess the tense requires identifying the tense of the verb in question. An extensive list of questions is aimed at improving understanding of six different tenses and aids in enhancing communication abilities in general. The questions in challenges are designed to reasonably match the learning needs of all age groups. A lesson outlining the basic tenets of the concept can be accessed anytime from within the game. 

Once you’ve enabled the voice app, just say Alexa, open English Tenses, and use the following commands:

To pick a game level:
Just say “Change the tense” or “Guess the tense”. 

To get a quick lesson on tenses, say “Demo”

To pass over a question, say “skip”.

To listen to the question again, say “repeat”. 

To switch to another game level, say “change level”.

To erase your progress and start fresh, say “reset the game”.

To understand the rules of the game, say “help”.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
